keywords: Bobby Flay's Burgers Fries and Shakes
name: Mocha-Caramel-Kahlúa Milkshake
description: This Bobby Flay recipes makes one Kahlúa-spiked 16-ounce milkshake or two 8-ounce milkshakes.
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons caramel sauce, plus more for garnish
11 ounces premium vanilla ice cream (about 1 3/4 packed cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the milk, espresso powder, chocolate syrup, caramel sauce, and Kahlúa in a blender and blend until combined, about 5 seconds. Add the ice cream and blend until smooth, about 10 seconds. Serve immediately, garnished with the whipped cream and chocolate-covered espresso beans and a drizzle of caramel sauce, if desired.
